[\*\*\* The Clifton City Council is scheduled for Tuesday, February 10th, at 6PM in the Clifton Civic Center Council Chambers at 403 W 3rd Street. \*\*\* City offices will be closed on Monday, February 16th for Presidents' Day. \*\*\* Sanitation services changed on October 1st to a once weekly cart pick up and weekly bulk/brush pick up. You can find more information on the Public Notices page of our website. \*\*\*](https://cityofclifton.org/departments/#)

Departments
===========

**Hours of Operation**:  
8:30 a.m. – 4:30 p.m.  
Monday – Friday

**Phone:** 254-675-8337  
**Fax:** 254-675-8358  
**Water/Sewer Emergency:** 254-386-6374  
**Clifton Police Dept:** 254-675-6620

Please contact [City Hall](https://cityofclifton.org/contact-us/) and your call will be directed to the appropriate department.

**Address**:  
P.O. Box 231  
403 West Third Street  
Clifton, TX 76634
